mapper.select: select blog_id, title from blog order by update_time desc limit #{size}
select blog_id, title, first_picture, create_time from blog order by rand() limit #{size}

select b.blog_id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.content_id, b.description, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.views, b.top, b.comment_enable, b.category_id from blog_tag bt right join blog b on b.blog_id = bt.blog_id where bt.tag_id = #{tagId} order by b.update_time

select b.blog_id, b.title, c.text contentText from blog b join content c on b.content_id = c.content_id
where b.title like #{query} or c.text like #{query}
select concat(year(create_time), '年', month(create_time), '月') yearMonth from blog group by yearMonth
select concat(year(create_time), '年', month(create_time), '月') yearMonth, blog_id, title, day(create_time) day from blog order by create_time desc

select blog_id, title, first_picture, content_id, description, create_time, update_time, views, top, comment_enable, category_id from blog where concat(year(create_time), '年', month(create_time), '月') = #{param2} order by top desc, create_time desc
